tool_description: This is a simple API that provides the Quran in json format  with meaning English and Bangla.
name: Online Quran API
title: Online Quran API

api_list.name: Chapter or Surah Details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://online-quran-api.p.rapidapi.com/surahs/Surah-Al-Fatihah"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "online-quran-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
